Josh Sled wrote:
> Not having unsafe operations activated by GET allows "web
> accelerators" to work.

The situation is worse than if web accelerators didn't work. The web 
accelerators will continue to work perfectly well as far as they're 
concerned - they'll just be blissfully unware of all the items being 
deleted on the server as they follow the links.
